class_d_05_language_01:
How did you like the midterm exam? You all did
really great![npcn:26]
class_d_05_language_02:
We’re halfway there! And now, time for another
lesson! Êtes-vous prêts—are you ready?[npcn:26]
class_d_05_language_03:
Très bonne réponse—great answer! Merci, my
friends! I knew I could count on you stars.[npcn:26]
class_d_05_language_04:
Leading up to the midterm, we learned all sorts
of words from different regions![npcn:26]
class_d_05_language_05:
Starting today, though, I’ll be throwing a curve
ball—for we begin listening comprehension![npcn:26]
class_d_05_language_06: Vas-y—go for it, my assistant! Pika pi, Pikachu![npcn:26]
class_d_05_language_07:
As you just heard, Pokémon can also use words
to communicate![npcn:26]
class_d_05_language_08:
It’s not always easy for us to understand them,
but their words have meaning—just as ours do.[npcn:26]
class_d_05_language_09:
Pokémon can use language to share all kinds of
information with each other—like the location of\r
food or whether there may be predators nearby![npcn:26]
class_d_05_language_10:
The same Pokémon’s cries may sound different
depending on what it wants to say![npcn:26]
class_d_05_language_11:
I’m sure you’re all curious, so aujourd’hui—today,
that is—let’s learn some Pokémon language![npcn:26]
class_d_05_language_12: Je t’en prie—if you would be so kind, Pikachu![npcn:26]
class_d_05_language_13:
What emotion do you suppose Pikachu was
trying to convey just now?[npcn:26]
class_d_05_language_answer_01:
[BD06:0]Sorry, [trnm:0], that’s not right!
Pokémon\r
language\r
is\r
hard,\r
isn’t it?[npcn:26]
class_d_05_language_answer_02:
[BD06:0]Sorry, [trnm:0], that’s not right!
Pokémon\r
language\r
is\r
hard,\r
isn’t it?[npcn:26]
class_d_05_language_answer_03:
[BD06:0]Merveilleux, [trnm:0]! Correct!
I guess\r
we\r
should\r
call\r
you “Professor”![npcn:26]
class_d_05_language_16:
That’s right—I had my little Pikachu friend here
pretend to be angry for us![npcn:26]
class_d_05_language_17:
Don’t you think he did a great job? Give Pikachu
a round of applause, everyone![npcn:26]
class_d_05_language_18:
The same Pokémon can even communicate its
feelings in many different ways![npcn:26]
class_d_05_language_19:
Their voices change depending on their mood
and physical condition.[npcn:26]
class_d_05_language_20:
Try listening more carefully to Pokémon—you
might gain a deeper understanding of them![npcn:26]
class_d_05_language_21:
That having been said, Pokémon are quite
mysterious creatures![npcn:26]
class_d_05_language_22:
Some actually don’t communicate with words at
all, but instead use things like electromagnetic\r
or ultrasonic waves—some even use telepathy![npcn:26]
class_d_05_language_23:
And now, apropos of nothing, let me give you
all one of my wise words of advice![npcn:26]
class_d_05_language_24:
If you poke at your Pokémon too many times
while washing them during picnics, they’ll get\r
mad at you like Pikachu just demonstrated![npcn:26]
class_d_05_language_25:
Well, adios! Mata ne! À la prochaine! See you
later, everyone![npcn:26]
